entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @SenSchumer I wonder how many of those New Yorkers got $1,000s of free TVs, electronics, clothing, liquor, etc...during the riots? Oh...and weren't social distancing or wearing a proper mask? If people in masses can ignore curfews, then COVID-19 was a sham, as a whole, to destroy the economy
